Agent Response.example: Supplier A is the best choice based on pricing and procurement rules. Supplier B is less favorable due to high pricing.
Agent Response.description: The AI model's response rating the suppliers.

get.description: Procurement Analysis is a tool that helps do analysis around procurement including suppliers, products, vendors and shipping companies. It gathers information the web, performance reports and procurement rules to compare different options for procuring a particular product. Input format: This tool needs the know what research needs to be conducted. Examples include "Research the suppliers for product Xtralife", "Research the suppliers for Xtralife".
